en.title: Player's Construction LLC
en.description: Repair & remodel experts. Licensed, bonded, insured.

content.html:
At Player's Construction, we believe every home deserves the highest quality repairs and remodels, completed with integrity and clear communication.

Whether you're refreshing a space, repairing damages, or transforming your home with a full remodel, our team is committed to delivering excellence at every step.
content.markdown:
At Player's Construction, we believe every home deserves the highest quality repairs and remodels, completed with integrity and clear communication. 

Whether you're refreshing a space, repairing damages, or transforming your home with a full remodel, our team is committed to delivering excellence at every step.

en.heading: From minor fixes to major transformations, we bring expertise, reliability, and a customer-first approach to every project.

body.html:
West Salem
 Full exterior remodel of a 3100 sq ft complex including new windows, siding, trim and paint.
body.markdown:
West Salem
 Full exterior remodel of a 3100 sq ft complex including new windows, siding, trim and paint.

body.html:
Forest Grove
More than a facelift! This bathroom had to be torn down to the studs for structural repairs prior to LVP floors, subway tile and fresh paint.
body.markdown:
Forest Grove
More than a facelift! This bathroom had to be torn down to the studs for structural repairs prior to LVP floors, subway tile and fresh paint.

body.html:
McMinnville
All new friendly neighbor western red cedar fence at this beautiful.
body.markdown:
McMinnville
All new friendly neighbor western red cedar fence at this beautiful.

en.subheading: We'd love to hear from you.

code.html: {@html content.html}

content.html:
Join us on our mission

Through awareness, education, and direct action, we're working to combat climate change and protect our precious ecosystems. Together, we can make a difference.

Since our founding, we've been at the forefront of environmental conservation. Our dedicated team of scientists, activists, and volunteers works tirelessly to protect endangered species, restore critical habitats, and educate the public about the urgency of climate action.
content.markdown:
# Join us on our mission

 Through awareness, education, and direct action, we're working to combat climate change and protect our precious ecosystems. Together, we can make a difference.

Since our founding, we've been at the forefront of environmental conservation. Our dedicated team of scientists, activists, and volunteers works tirelessly to protect endangered species, restore critical habitats, and educate the public about the urgency of climate action.

body.html: We are a beacon of commitment towards preserving our forests. In the embrace of nature, we stand steadfast, advocating for the voiceless sentinels of our ecosystem. Together, we forge a path towards a greener tomorrow.
body.markdown: We are a beacon of commitment towards preserving our forests. In the embrace of nature, we stand steadfast, advocating for the voiceless sentinels of our ecosystem. Together, we forge a path towards a greener tomorrow.

body.html: Eager to leave a green footprint? Lend your hands to Lorem Ipsum Dolor. Each seed you sow, every forest you help clean, and every conversation you initiate about the importance of trees, echoes in our mission. Every action matters!
body.markdown: Eager to leave a green footprint? Lend your hands to Lorem Ipsum Dolor. Each seed you sow, every forest you help clean, and every conversation you initiate about the importance of trees, echoes in our mission. Every action matters!

content.html: Our calendar software company was founded with the goal of helping people better manage their time and stay organized. We recognized that many people struggle to keep track of their busy schedules, and we wanted to provide a simple and effective solution. With our calendar software, we've created an easy-to-use tool that allows users to quickly add and view events, set reminders, and invite others to events. We've also made sure to integrate seamlessly with popular email services, so that users can easily stay connected with their colleagues and friends.
content.markdown:
Our calendar software company was founded with the goal of helping people better manage their time and stay organized. We recognized that many people struggle to keep track of their busy schedules, and we wanted to provide a simple and effective solution.
With our calendar software, we've created an easy-to-use tool that allows users to quickly add and view events, set reminders, and invite others to events. We've also made sure to integrate seamlessly with popular email services, so that users can easily stay connected with their colleagues and friends.

en.heading: We're passionate about building a better meeting workflow

content.html: Our calendar software company was founded with the goal of helping people better manage their time and stay organized. We recognized that many people struggle to keep track of their busy schedules, and we wanted to provide a simple and effective solution. With our calendar software, we've created an easy-to-use tool that allows users to quickly add and view events, set reminders, and invite others to events. We've also made sure to integrate seamlessly with popular email services, so that users can easily stay connected with their colleagues and friends.
content.markdown:
Our calendar software company was founded with the goal of helping people better manage their time and stay organized. We recognized that many people struggle to keep track of their busy schedules, and we wanted to provide a simple and effective solution.
With our calendar software, we've created an easy-to-use tool that allows users to quickly add and view events, set reminders, and invite others to events. We've also made sure to integrate seamlessly with popular email services, so that users can easily stay connected with their colleagues and friends.

en.heading: We're passionate about building a better meeting workflow
